title: Webpage Change Tracker + AI Summary
description: Monitor any webpage and detect content changes with optional AI explanation

url.title: Webpage URL
url.description: The URL of the webpage you want to monitor.

diffType.title: Diff Type
diffType.description: Choose 'text' for a clean, readable diff or 'html' for a raw, structural comparison.

useAI.title: Enable AI summary
useAI.description: Toggle this on to enable the AI-powered summary of changes.

aiProvider.title: AI Provider (requires AI summary to be enabled)

modelPreset.title: AI Model Preset
modelPreset.description: Select a popular model or choose 'CUSTOM' to enter your own below.

customModel.title: Custom Model ID
customModel.description: Enter your specific model ID here if you selected 'CUSTOM' above (e.g. 'google/gemini-2.0-pro-exp-02-05').

summaryLength.title: Summary Length (in words)
summaryLength.description: The maximum number of words for the AI-generated summary.
